definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: How shall the criminal responsibility of foreigners who enjoy diplomatic privileges and immunities be investigated?
sentences.chinese: 享有外交特權和豁免權的外國人的刑事責任怎樣追究？
